context: Payoneer facing competitive pressure after implementing major pricing changes in 2025, eliminating free Payoneer-to-Payoneer transfers and adding minimum withdrawal fees ($15 for non-local currencies). These changes eroded key competitive advantage of low-cost in-network transfers. Cross-border payments market continues rapid growth driven by e-commerce globalization, blockchain adoption, and digital transformation.
